channel.title: Music – Joe Cocker & Jennifer Warnes
channel.description: Recent content in Joe Cocker & Jennifer Warnes on Music

item.title: Joe Cocker & Jennifer Warnes - Up Where We Belong
item.description:
작곡: Joe Cocker / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 8228

Who know what tomorrow
brings in a world
Few hearts survive
all I know
Is the way I feel
when it’s real
I keep that alive
the road is- long
There are mountains
in our way
But we climb
a step everyday
Love lift us up
where we belong
Where the eagles cry
on a mountain high
Love lift us up
where we belong
Far from the world
we know
Up there
clear winds blow
Some hang on
to used to be
Live their lives
looking behind
All we have
is her and now
All our life
out there to find
The road is- long
there are mountains
In our way–
but we climb a step
Everyday
love lift us
Up where we belong
where the eagles fly
On a mountain high
love lift us up
Where we belong
far from the world
We know where
clear winds blow-
Times go by
no time to cry–
Life’s you and I–
alive today
Love lift us
up where we belong
Where the eagles fly
on a mountain high
Love lift us
up where we belong
Far from the world
we know
Where clear winds blow
love lift us
Up where we belong
where the eagles fly
On a mountain high
love lift us
Up where we belong
far from the world
We know where
clear winds blow-
